column1: S0189.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0189.DECK.  189. SURVEY NUMBER
S0189.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S0189.Q1. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEA?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER TWO YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0189.Q2. IN GENERAL, HOW OFTEN WOULD YOU SAY YOU HAVE LISTENED TO THE RADIO DURING THE PAST FOUR WEEK?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. OFTEN 3. ONCE IN A WHILE 4. SELDOM OR NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0189.Q3. DURING THE PAST FOUR WEEKS, HOW MUCH OF THE TIME YOU HAVE SPENT LISTENING TO THE RADIO WAS SPENT LISTENING TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAM?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THE TIME 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. SOME OF THE TIME 4. NONE OF THE TIME 5. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER

S0189.Q4. IF YOU HAVE LISTENED TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAMS AT ANY TIME SINCE YOU'VE BEEN ON THE CONTINENT, IS THERE ANYTHING ABOUT THE KIND OF BROADCASTS, OR ABOUT THE WAY THEY ARE PRESENTED, THAT YOU PARTICULARLY LIK?  1. I HAVEN'T LISTENED TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAMS 2. NO, NOTHING I PARTICULARLY LIKE 3. YES - I PARTICULARLY LIKE (SOMETHING WRITTEN IN) 4. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER

S0189.Q5. I HAVEN'T LISTENED TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAMS 2. NO, NOTHING I PARTICULARLY DISLIKE 3. YES, I PARTICULARLY DISLIKE (SOMETHING WRITTEN IN) 4. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER

S0189.Q7. IF YOU HAVE LISTENED TO THE ALLIED EXPEDITIONARY FORCES PROGRAMS, HAVE YOU HEARD ANY OF THE HOURLY NEWS BROADCAST?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER

S0189.Q8A. IN GENERAL DO YOU LIKE OR DISLIKE THE WAY THE NEWS IS PRESENTE?  1. LIKE IT VERY MUCH 2. LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. DON'T PARTICULARLY LIKE OR DISLIKE IT 4. DISLIKE IT PRETTY MUCH 5. DISLIKE IT VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER
S0189.Q8B. ARE THERE ANY PARTICULAR THINGS ABOUT THE WAY THE NEWS IS PRESENTED THAT YOU LIK?  1. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 2. NO 3. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER
S0189.Q8C. ARE THERE ANY PARTICULAR THINGS ABOUT THE WAY THE NEWS IS PRESENTED THAT YOU DISLIK?  1. YES, SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 2. NO 3. YES, NOTHING WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER

S0189.Q9. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL THAT THE PRESENT JOINT BROADCASTING SERIVCE WHICH IS DESIGNED FOR ALL ENGLISH SPEAKING ALLIED TROOPS IN THE THEATER IS BEST, OR DO YOU FEEL THAT EACH OF THE ALLIES SHOULD HAVE A SEPARATE SERVICE BROADCASTING THEIR OWN PROGRAMS PRINCIPALLY TO THEIR OWN TROOP?  1. FEEL THAT THE PRESENT JOINT BROADCASTING SERVICE IS BEST 2. FEEL THAT EACH OF THE ALLIES SHOULD BROADCAST THEIR PROGRAMS PRINCIPALLY TO THEIR OWN TROOPS 3. FEEL IT DOESN'T MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE HOW IT IS DONE 0. NO ANSWER
S0189.V9A. OPINION ABOUT BROADCASTING SERVICE:  1. ANTI-BRITISH 2. PRO-AMERICAN 3. OTHER 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0189.Q10. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  1. FIELD ARTILLERY 2. QUARTERMASTER 3. INFANTRY 4. ARMORED COMMAND 5. AIR CORPS 6. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 7. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 8. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

S0189.Q11. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
S0189.Q12. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WA?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S0189.V13. COMMENTS ON IMPROVING RADIO SERVICE:  1. PRO-AMERICAN COMMENTS 2. ANTI-BRITISH COMMENTS 3. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER
S0189.V14. UNIT IDENTIFICATION: X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.  ANP
